name: Callie
description:
Is middle school a good memory for you?

What were you like when you were 13?

Maybe, you too, needed someone to talk about anything. You wanted someone to listen to your problems.

If so, Callie's story might resound within you.

Listen to her story, give her advices and help her grow during her school year throughout this short visual novel!

                                                                                        

"Callie" was made as an assignement as part of my game design student course. We had a span of 50 hours to make it, but I guess I took a lot more...

The theme was "growing", so I decided to make it about growing as a person. It was the occasion for me to improve my english and writing skills at the same time!

Do not hesitate to give me some feedbacks, and I hope you like it!
